content: Obama's new budget terminates the two major federal funding streams for abstinence-only-until-marriage programs. Ineffective sex-ed programs that promote a specific religious ideology instead of accurate medical information will no longer be funded.
reply: Obama's new budget terminates the two major federal funding streams for abstinence-only-until-marriage programs. Ineffective sex-ed programs that promote a specific religious ideology instead of accurate medical information will no longer be funded.
title: Abstinance Only

content: I'm fine if parents, churches, or other groups want to promote "abstinence-only" sex-ed. It's a lovely IDEAL. But as we know, it's not an effective sex-ed principle, because PEOPLE HAVE SEX. Abstinence-only sex-ed is simple a WASTE OF MONEY, and I'm glad to know that they'll stop WASTING MY TAX DOLLARS on ineffective programs. "Don't have sex." Why do you need money to say that? It just doesn't need funding! Our government wastes enough money; we don't need to waste it on an ineffective lesson plan.

They can push this all they want in their churches and in public venues, on their own dime if they have that kind of money to waste. title: Abstinance Only

content: quote: Originally posted by tawodi: Tha's O.K. Bill we know what cha meant!! Abstinence make the heart grow fonder!! Right?? Old joke: A man cuts one, and it sounds like "Honda!" WTF? says a nearby observer. "I've been drinking an old Czechoslavakian drink that contains absinthe," says the man. "Absinthe makes the fart go Honda." [Old Czech absinthe recipe: Pour a shot of Absinthe in a small tumbler. Take a teaspoon of sugar. Dip the teaspoon into the absinthe so that the sugar absorbs the liquor. Then, holding the spoon above the absinthe, set fire to the sugar. Let it burn for a minute or so. The sugar will bubble and begin to caramelize. Once the flame is beginning to die down, stir the shot of absinthe with the sugared spoon (smothering the glass if it catches afire). Now add an equal measure of water and some ice.]
quote: Originally posted by tawodi: Tha's O.K. Bill we know what cha meant!! Abstinence make the heart grow fonder!! Right??
reply: Old joke: A man cuts one, and it sounds like "Honda!" WTF? says a nearby observer. "I've been drinking an old Czechoslavakian drink that contains absinthe," says the man. "Absinthe makes the fart go Honda." [Old Czech absinthe recipe: Pour a shot of Absinthe in a small tumbler. Take a teaspoon of sugar. Dip the teaspoon into the absinthe so that the sugar absorbs the liquor. Then, holding the spoon above the absinthe, set fire to the sugar. Let it burn for a minute or so. The sugar will bubble and begin to caramelize. Once the flame is beginning to die down, stir the shot of absinthe with the sugared spoon (smothering the glass if it catches afire). Now add an equal measure of water and some ice.]
